author: Moobeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: 3/15 PBE Update
text:
[ RECENT NEWS:   Galio updated bio and new story   /dev on Sound Design for Dragon Sorceress Zyra ]

[This is a  W ORK  I N  P ROGRESS POST .] [ Status @ 4 PM PT : The PBE just came up from maintenance. Working!.]

The PBE has been updated!

Continue reading for more information!

( Warning : PBE Content is tentative and subject to change - what you see below may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers at the end of the cycle! Manage your expectations accordingly.)

Table of Contents New Brolaf Chroma Skin Tweaks Balance Changes Notes and Context 
New Brolaf Chroma New AIR client assets for Brolaf chroma in today's patch, no in-game assets yet though.

Brolaf               

Skin Tweaks [Looks like a few potential skin/chroma tweaks. Looking into it when PBE comes back up!]

Balance Changes *  Remember  *: The PBE is a testing grounds for new, tentative, and sometimes radical or experimental changes. Be aware that what you see below may be lacking context or other changes that didn't make it in or were implemented in an earlier patch this cycle! These are  not  official notes.

Champions Fiddlesticks 
[ Reminder : Fiddlestacks has several other changes currently testing on PBE]
Dark Wind (E)  additional damage to minions/monsters reverted from 75% to 50%. Back to live values.  
Notes & Context 
1)  With his update currently testing on PBE, Galio's updated bio and new story are now available .  


Check out  [ THIS PAGE ]  for a  comprehensive list of the new content & changes currently on the PBE as a part of this cycle  or catch up with the individual update links below !
3/7 PBE Update: Galio champion update, new Alistar, Kennen, Kog'Maw, and Renekton skins, new chroma, and more! 3/8 PBE Update: New Skin Splash Art, New icons, & more! 3/9 PBE Update: More Tentative Balance Changes 3/13 PBE Update: Galio Login and More! 3/14 PBE Update: New Summoner Icon, Updated Lux Pick/Ban quotes, Skin Tweaks, balance changes, & more!
